articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Chile
Songun Policy of Kim Jong Il Lauded Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Chile 
e091401 - Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Chile

    Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Let Us Give Full Play to Advantages of Our People's Power" was published in booklet by the Servicios Graficos Publishing House in Chile on August 27.
 The work, brought out on Dec. 21, Juche 81 (1992), stresses the solidity and vitality of the people's power and clarifies issues in enhancing its function and role and holding fast to the basic principle for building the people's power.

articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Presidential Envoy
    Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Konstantin Borisovich Pulikovski, presidential envoy to the Far East Region of the Russian Federation.
 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Sept. 13.

articles.title: High Vigilance against Reactionary Ideological and Cultural Infiltration Urged
Kim Yong Nam Meets Chairman of Federation Council of Russia
Chairman of Federation Council of Russia Leaves for Home
Kim Il Chol Meets Russian Army Artistes
articles.content:
Chairman of Federation Council of Russia Leaves for Home
    Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Sergei Mikhailovich Mironov, chairman of the Federation Council of Russia, and his party left here for home Tuesday.
 He and his party were seen off at the airport by Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, officials concerned and Andrei Gennadiyevich Karlov, Russian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Hit by Torrential Rain
articles.content:
Kim Il Chol Meets Russian Army Artistes
    Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Vice-Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, met and had a friendly talk with leading members and principal actors of the Russian Army Academic Song and Dance Ensemble Named after Alexandrov led by N. V. Burbyga, deputy director of the Education General Bureau of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation at the April 25 House of Culture on Sept.14.
 Present there were Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Jong Ha Chol, KPA General Pak Jae Gyong, Chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Literature and the Arts of Korea Kim Jong Ho, and Igor Pavlov, military attache of the Russian embassy here.
